lead_paragraph: Federal authorities continue to pursue a case against the website’s former chief executive on charges of money laundering and promoting prostitution.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Employees of Escort Site Have Charges Dismissed
headline.main: Charges Dismissed Against 6 Ex-Employees of Rentboy.com

snippet: Federal authorities continue to pursue a case against the website’s former chief executive on charges of money laundering and promoting prostitution.
abstract: Federal charges have been dismissed against six former employees of Rentboy.com, website characterized by authorities as online male brothel; case against site chief executive Jeffrey Hurant on charges of money laundering and promoting prostitution will move forward.
